* '''Confirm Hot Key actions'''
** Fn + F1 – WiFi Radio on/off
** Fn + Esc – Suspend
** Fn + F2 – Toggle bluetooth
** Fn + F3 – toggle between built-in LCD, external monitor and both
** Fn + F4 – Mute
** Fn + F5 – Volume down
** Fn + F6 - Volume Up
** Fn + F7 – Brightness down
** Fn + F8 – Brightness up
** Fn + 3 - Play/Pause
** Fn + 4 - Stop
** Fn + 5 - Previous track
** Fn + 6 - Next track
